title: LoL installation
body: Anyone has a pic by pic guide on how to install league. Asking for a buddy.

replies.body: Our [reinstallation guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can offer some more specific step by steps, but the [installer ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)itself should do most of the work!
